name: Try Again Next Slime
description:
The Tree of Time is starting to rot. Using its last strength, it'll create its last masterpiece: You, a slime tasked to transport the seed to its new everlasting place. The only problem being you can only live for 60 seconds with the seed inside you... You'll have to use the Tree of Time's ability to go back in time when you desintegrate to start back from 0 and go farther, since its power is withering some things might not go back to their original state...


ZQSD or Arrows to move around,
E to pick items,
Space to use items,
Scroll mouse wheel to switch item.
